page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT DACRE AREA.
page.content: Lots of games are played like B.M.XING Cricket,Football and Sledging.To play Cricket you need a bat and a ball and some posts for wicket.You have to hit the ball as hard as you can then you run from one set of wickets to the other scoring runs.Football needs 11 players a side.Goals are scored by kicking the leather ball though the goal posts.In winter people go sledging down snowy fields.A B.M.X is a bike but has padding and is stronger than a normal bike,you need a difficult course.Indoor games include_Cards,Dominoes,Darts,Board Games,Arcade games and snooker.
